meta.description: Semantic rules to enforce Non-Euclidean routing logic

metric_violation.rule: Euclidean Distance (L2) is FORBIDDEN for next-hop selection.
metric_violation.enforcement: Static Analysis / Runtime Check of distance function calls.

embedding_violation.rule: Node coordinates must be treated as Hyperbolic Points, not Cartesian Vectors.

path_validity.rule: All dynamic paths must be Geodesics or piecewise Geodesics.
